elasticsearch-logs.name: elasticsearch-logs
elasticsearch-logs.description: Faker for Elasticsearch - log analysis and anomaly detection
args: Generate Elasticsearch log analysis tools for post-deployment log investigation. Include tools for: 1) Log search (search_logs, aggregate_logs, get_log_patterns), 2) Error detection (find_new_errors_post_deployment, analyze_error_frequency, get_error_context), 3) Performance indicators (analyze_slow_query_logs, detect_timeout_increases, track_gc_activity), 4) Anomaly detection (detect_log_volume_spikes, identify_unusual_patterns, find_missing_expected_logs), 5) Correlation (correlate_errors_with_deployment, track_error_propagation_across_services). Accept index_pattern, deployment_timestamp, service_filter, log_level, and time_range.
